params.content:
@echo off
cd TANGO
git clone https://github.com/justinjohn0306/Wav2Lip.git
git clone https://github.com/dajes/frame-interpolation-pytorch.git
conda create -p ./env python=3.9.20 -y
conda run -p ./env pip install -r pre-requirements.txt
conda run -p ./env pip install -r requirements.txt

params.html: TANGO installation completed! Note: First run will download necessary checkpoints (~35GB)
